introduction: A prismic view of acclaimed cartoonist-philosopher Michael Leunig. Filmed over five eventful years, we observe Michael grappling with life, art and mortality. The reflections of an ageing man encompass the curious boy-Leunig; past, present and future hopes and dreams collide in this portrait of one of Australia’s most prolific artists.[CREW]Writer & Director - Kasimir BurgessProducer - Philippa CampeyExecutive Producers - Mitzi Goldman & Paul WiegardEditors - Simon Price & Kasimir BurgessProduction Designer - Paige AndersonComposer - Luke AltmannSound Designer - Emma BortignonProduction Company: Film Camp
